relation.text: was dragged up to her ancles in the Wet . We are now
tomorrow -- their Majesties G. Gunning Mary Hamilton Rob Gunning This is all a prelude to B- Gunning s comfortable Letter -- M. Hamilton desires
Sunday Next I shall be in Town -- Lady Wake will be
hope You have been to Chelsea -- Adieu this is a Curious letter of scraps Wednesday
recd . Your little letter of ye . 26 th . May
